feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ci: :green_heart: refactor GHA lint tools by @nemchik in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1953
  • chore(deps): pin dependencies by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1964
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.6.15 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1965
  • Move ds_version and ds_update_available to main.sh by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1966

New Contributors

  • @renovate[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1964

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.10.3...v2025.07.11.1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.11.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add global defaults for turning on STORAGE mounts by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1967
  • Move the application and version info down in the usage text. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1968
  • Add a version notice at start of execution. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.11.1...v2025.07.11.2
